name: Krazy JUMP Piggie and Co
description:
Are you ready for a new adventure? Help Piggie and friends to reach the furthest end of the field.

Krazy JUMP Piggie and Co is a FREE really fun jumping endless game. What's your highest score?

Collect coins and unlock new characters!

Download NOW and tap to jump!

FREE game
Easy game play
Various animal skins - pig, bunny, fox and others
İnfinite terrain
Highscore
Beautiful scrolling background
Day and night
Enjoyable music

Have fun!
